dict.acceptation: 邪恶的；缺德的；淘气的，顽皮的；恶劣的；

sent.orig: Nowadays WICKED means cool or hip.
sent.trans: 现在WICKED的意思是酷或很棒。

sent.orig: The mathematics of spinning black holes is wicked hard but they are wicked good fun!
sent.trans: 关于旋转黑洞的数学虽然难以应付，可是却乐趣无比呢！

sent.orig: How long shall the wicked, O Lord, How long shall the wicked exult?
sent.trans: 诗94:3耶和华阿、恶人夸胜要到几时呢、要到几时呢。

sent.orig: NIV How long will the wicked, O Lord, how long will the wicked be jubilant?
sent.trans: [和合]耶和华啊！5恶人夸胜要到6几时呢？要到几时呢？

sent.orig: The lamp of the wicked snuffed out; the flame of his fire stops burning.
sent.trans: 恶人的亮光必要熄灭。他的火焰必不照耀。
